analysis.key_quote: The possibility of firing them to replace with people who are appointed at will, and very often have no expertise in the areas they work in is an affront to the lives of all who have served us thus far, will lead to decreased government service, greater resentment and lack of public involvement overall.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the removal of civil servants and the potential negative impact on government service and community involvement, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and politicization.
